com.opera.core.systems

Interface CapturesScreen

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TestDriver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OperaDesktopDriver, OperaDriver, OperaMobileDriver, OperaWebElement, TestOperaDesktopDriver, TestOperaDriver, TestOperaMobileDriver

    public interface CapturesScreen
    Indicates that an OperaDriver can capture the whole screen area.
    See Also:
    ScreenCaptureReply

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScreenCaptureReply captureScreen()
      Takes a screen capture of the whole screen, including the areas outside of the viewport and the browser window.
      ScreenCaptureReply captureScreen(long timeout)
      Takes a screen capture of the whole screen, including the areas outside of the viewport and the browser window.
      ScreenCaptureReply captureScreen(long timeout, List<String> knownMD5s)
      Takes a screen capture of the whole screen, including the areas outside of the viewport and the browser window.

    • Method Detail

      • captureScreen

        ScreenCaptureReply captureScreen()
        Takes a screen capture of the whole screen, including the areas outside of the viewport and the browser window.
        Returns:
        a screen capture reply

      • captureScreen

        ScreenCaptureReply captureScreen(long timeout)
        Takes a screen capture of the whole screen, including the areas outside of the viewport and the browser window.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the number of milliseconds to wait before taking the screenshot
        Returns:
        a screen capture reply

      • captureScreen

        ScreenCaptureReply captureScreen(long timeout,
                               List<String> knownMD5s)
        Takes a screen capture of the whole screen, including the areas outside of the viewport and the browser window.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the number of milliseconds to wait before taking the screenshot
        knownMD5s - a list of previous screenshots' MD5 hashes; if they match the hash of this screenshot then no image data is returned
        Returns:
        a screen capture reply
